name: Laravel Banking Website
desc: I developed this project using PHP and JavaScript. The project involved implementing advanced security features to protect customer data, creating a user-friendly interface for easy navigation, and enabling various banking transactions such as fund transfers and bill payments.

name: Vue Banking Website
desc: I developed this project using Vue.js and Laravel. I focused on creating a user-friendly interface with advanced features for managing customer accounts, conducting secure transactions, and customizing banking preferences.

name: React Hospital Website
desc: For this project, I served as a developer and utilized React.js to build a cutting-edge and dynamic online platform for a hospital. I crafted a responsive and user-friendly interface that allows patients to easily access information, schedule appointments, and interact with healthcare providers.

name: Wordpress Landing Page
desc: For this project, I designed and developed a landing page that effectively captures visitor attention and encourages engagement. By customizing themes and plugins, I ensured seamless navigation and optimized performance for visitors.

name: PUG + SCSS Private Sauna Landing Page
desc: For this project, I took on the role of both designer and developer, creating a visually stunning and functional web page for a private sauna business. I designed the layout, selected color schemes, and crafted the overall aesthetic using Pug for templating and SCSS for styling.

name: HTML5 + CSS3 Clinic Landing Page
desc: For this project, I utilized the latest web technologies to create a professional and informative web page for a clinic.I designed and developed the landing page using HTML5 for structuring the content and CSS3 for styling the elements.

name: HTML5 + SCSS LP(include design)
desc: For this project, I took on the role of both designer and developer to create a modern and visually appealing web page.  The project successfully highlighted my abilities in both design and development, resulting in a visually attractive and user-friendly online presence.
